title: OVEN-POACHED COD WITH HERBS
directions: Combine the spring onions (reserving some of the green part), garlic, mint, parsley, lemon juice and stock in a dish that can just hold the cod in one layer.

Put cod on the herb-garlic mixture and turn to moisten. Season with salt and pepper and roast at 230°C (450°F) mark 8 for 8–10min. Sprinkle with reserved spring onion, garnish with lemon wedges and serve with mashed potato.
Try our other delicious cod recipes:
ingredients: (1⁄4 pint) fish, chicken or vegetable stock
